name: Volcano Jump
description:
Team:  Jonathan Leland, Yu Chen, Yuanzhu Wu (Zari), Zeduo Ouyang (Oswald)

This is a 2D platform game made with Unity as an assignment work during my Games & Playable Media graduate program at UC Santa Cruz.

In the course, we were asked to make a game based on two verbs. The verbs for our team were kick and bounce. We decided to make a collaborative platforming game in which one player in charges of kicking and the other do the jumping. That's our game, Volcano Jump.
